main_definition: Improvements or upgrades made to something, usually with the aim of improving its performance, quality, or value.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Upgrades to computer software or hardware components that improve functionality
meanings_and_examples.example: Installing new graphics enhancements on a video game console for better visuals.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Modifications made to a product to increase its value or appeal
meanings_and_examples.example: Adding stylish design features as enhancements to a piece of furniture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Improvements in skills or abilities, often through training or practice
meanings_and_examples.example: Enhancements to one's public speaking skills after attending several workshops and practicing regularly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Additional features that improve the overall user experience of a product or service
meanings_and_examples.example: Online banking enhancements such as mobile deposit and account alerts.
